SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT T.ID_ AS taskId, T.NAME_ AS taskName, T.FORM_KEY_ AS formKey, E.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS businessId, E.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId, DATE_FORMAT (T.CREATE_TIME_,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS startTime, E.NAME_ AS formName, E.TENANT_ID_ AS systemSn, T.ASSIGNEE_ AS assignee FROM ACT_RU_TASK T INNER JOIN ACT_RU_EXECUTION E ON T.PROC_INST_ID_ = E.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I ON I.TASK_ID_ = T.ID_ WHERE E.BUSINESS_KEY_ IS NOT NULL
AND T.PROC_DEF_ID_ LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.processDefId},'%')
AND ( T.ASSIGNEE_ = #{query.userId} OR ( T.ASSIGNEE_ IN ( SELECT G.GROUP_ID_ FROM ACT_ID_MEMBERSHIP G WHERE G.USER_ID_ = #{query.userId} ) ) OR ( ( T.ASSIGNEE_ IS NULL OR T.ASSIGNEE_ = '' ) AND ( I.USER_ID_ = #{query.userId} OR I.GROUP_ID_ IN ( SELECT G.GROUP_ID_ FROM ACT_ID_MEMBERSHIP G WHERE G.USER_ID_ = #{query.userId} ) ) ) ) ) D
